de.hlu.ust
Class Booking

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Finance
      de.hlu.ust.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
public class Booking
extends Finance
implements java.lang.Comparable

Booking object stores all informations about a single booking entry. For all calculations the bookings gross value is taken as base. The vat and the net values are calculated from the gross value and the vat rate.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getAllBookings

public static Booking[] getAllBookings()
                                throws AppException
Get all existing bookings in an array, sorted first by booking date and second after the bank statement.

Returns:
An array of all bookings.
Throws:
AppException - In case of read errors.

getAllBookings

public static Booking[] getAllBookings(int from,
                                       int to,
                                       int accountNumber)
                                throws AppException
Selecting bookings from a starting month, until to an ending month and a accounting number. Getting the result in an array, sorted first by booking date and second after the bank statement.

Parameters:
from - From that month (1...12).
to - Until this month (1...12).
accountNumber - Only for this accounting number, or 0 for all accounts.
Returns:
An array of the selected bookings.
Throws:
AppException - In case of read errors.

getBookingById

public static Booking getBookingById(int id)
                              throws AppException
Get an booking entry by the given booking identifier.

Parameters:
id - The booking identifier.
Returns:
A reference to the booking entry found.
Throws:
AppException - In case of read errors or no such entry exists.

                                           throws AppException

Returns:
A reference to the booking entry found.
Throws:
AppException - In case of read errors or no such entry exists.

create

public void create()
            throws AppException
Create a new booking entry by making the new booking entry persistent. Saving the file as .old, setting the id, append *this and write all bookings.

Throws:
AppException - In case of read or write errors.

remove

public void remove()
            throws AppException
Remove this booking entry.

Throws:
AppException - In case of read or write errors, or if the entry isn't found.

update

public void update(int gross,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   int bankStatementId,
                   int accountId,
                   java.lang.String bookingDate,
                   java.util.GregorianCalendar date,
                   java.lang.String user,
                   double vat)
            throws AppException
Actualize the given booking by id in the persistence.

Parameters:
gross - The new gross value.
description - The new description.
bankStatementId - The new bank statement identifier or 0 if no bank statement exists.
accountId - The new account identifier.
bookingDate - The new last booking date.
date - Thew new last changed date and time.
user - The new last changed user.
vat - The new value added tax percents or 0 if the booking VAT free.
Throws:
AppException - In case of read or write errors, or if no booking entry exists for this identifier.

guessBookingYear

public static int guessBookingYear()
This method determines the booking year by average booking entries year.

If less then three booking entries exist or in case of read errors, use simple this year.

Returns:
The guessed booking year.
